\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 24078}

\subsection*{Sleep Time}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Comrade stalin}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 7.5 mg & oral & Pharms - Zopiclone & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 215.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I had a sleeping problem so i got my doc to prescribe zopiclone. I took the pill and went to bed. After 20 minutes my racing thoughts stopped, and my mind cleared. My body felt very comfortable and heavy. I then started dreaming and quickly fell into a deep sleep. Upon waking up I felt good. No hangover. no tiredness. After two weeks of this my precription ran out. I had no withdrawl symptoms.

\end{document}
